meanings.sent1: The fireworks show was the blastiest event of the year.
meanings.sent2: The storm last night was not as blasty as the one we had last month.
meanings.sent3: The blastiest cake at the party was the one with the most candles.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the blastiest sound in the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The blastiest color in the painting was the vibrant red in the corner.

meanings.sent1: Today's storm is blastier than yesterday's.
meanings.sent2: This firework is not as blasty as the one we saw last night.
meanings.sent3: The music at the concert was blastier than expected.
meanings.sent4: His jokes were blastier than usual, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent5: The blastier wind blew away all the leaves from the trees.
